p.k: This impressive solo concert by Colin Stetso, an American saxophonist known for his unique musical style influenced by a wide range of jazz genres, was recorded at the Pitchfork Music Festival in Paris, 2013.
p.d: This impressive solo concert by Colin Stetso, an American saxophonist known for his unique musical style influenced by a wide range of jazz genres, was recorded at the Pitchfork Music Festival in Paris, 2013. Stetson frequently collaborates with a number of renowned artists and indie bands; his saxophone can be heard on albums by Tom Waits, Bon Iver, and Sinnead O'Connor.
